struct BlackjackCard {
	enum Suit: Character {
		case spades = "â™ ï¸", hearts = "â™¥ï¸", diamonds = "â™¦ï¸", clubs = "â™£ï¸"
	}

	enum Rank: Int {
		case two = 2, three, four, five, six, seven, eight, nine, ten
		case jack, queen, king, ace

		struct Values {
			let first: Int, second: Int?
		}

		var values: Values {
			switch self {
			case .ace:
				return Values(first: 1, second: 11)
			case .jack, .queen, .king:
				return Values(first: 10, second: nil)
			default:
				return Values(first: self.rawValue, second: nil)
			}
		}
	}

	let rank: Rank, suit: Suit // ì €ì¥ ì†ì„±

	var subtitle: String { // ê³„ì‚° ì†ì„±
		var output = "\(suit.rawValue) ì„¸íŠ¸,"
		output += " ìˆ«ì \(rank.values.first)"

		if let second = rank.values.second {
			output += " ë˜ëŠ” \(second)"
		}

		return output
	}
}

let card1 = BlackjackCard(rank: .ace, suit: .spades)
print("1ë²ˆ ì¹´ë“œ: \(card1.subtitle)")
// "1ë²ˆ ì¹´ë“œ: â™ ï¸ ì„¸íŠ¸, ìˆ«ì 1 ë˜ëŠ” 11"

let card2 = BlackjackCard(rank: .five, suit: .diamonds)
print("2ë²ˆ ì¹´ë“œ: \(card2.subtitle)")
// "2ë²ˆ ì¹´ë“œ: â™¦ï¸ ì„¸íŠ¸, ìˆ«ì 5"

let heartsSymbol: Character = BlackjackCard.Suit.hearts.rawValue

struct K {
	static let appName = "MySuperApp"
	static let cellIdentifier = "ReusableCell"
	static let cellNibName = "MessageCell"
	static let registerSegue = "RegisterToChat"
	static let loginSegue = "LoginToChat"

	struct BrandColors {
		static let purple = "BrandPurple"
		static let lightPurple = "BrandLightPurple"
		static let blue = "BrandBlue"
		static let lightBlue = "BrandLightBlue"
	}

	struct FStore {
		static let collectionName = "messages"
		static let senderField = "sender"
		static let bodyField = "body"
		static let dateField = "date"
	}
}

let app = K.appName
let color = K.BrandColors.blue
class Message {
	private enum Status {
		case sent
		case received
		case read
	}

	let sender: String, recipient: String, content: String
	let timeStamp: Date

	private var status = Message.Status.sent

	init(sender: String, recipient: String, content: String) {
		self.sender = sender
		self.recipient = recipient
		self.content = content

		self.timeStampe = Date()
	}

	func getBasicInfo() -> String {
		return "ë³´ë‚¸ì‚¬ëŒ: \(sender), ë°›ëŠ”ì‚¬ëŒ: \(recipient), ë©”ì„¸ì§€ ë‚´ìš©: \(content), ë³´ë‚¸ ì‹œê°„: \(timeStamp.subtitle)"
	} 

	func statusColor() -> UIColor {
		switch status {
		case .sent:
			return UIColor(red: 1, green: 0, blue: 0, alpha: 1)
		case .received:
			return UIColor(red: 0, green: 0, blue: 1, alpha: 1)
		case .read:
			return UIColor(red: 0, green: 1, blue: 1, alpha: 1)
		}
	}
}

let message1 = Message(sender: "í™ê¸¸ë™", recipient: "ì„êº½ì •", content: "ë­í•´?")
print(message1.getBasicInfo())
